name: Season's Valley
description:
In this journey you will explore the magical universe of seasons valley to save mother nature, you will have the challenge of finding the ingredients to make the soup that will save her, but to find them you will have to venture through the portals and travel between seasons, are you ready?

Elias Pereira - Game Designer, Lead Programmer.

Angelo Gleyson - UI Artist, 2D Artist, Programmer.

Marcos Felipe - 2D Artist, Sound Designer.

Wilson Junior - Main 3D Artist.
